tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE event_schedule (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_time TIME,
    venue_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venue_capacity(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Event (
 event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 event_name VARCHAR(255),
 event_date DATE,
 venue_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES Venue(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Broadcast (
 broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 event_id INT,
 broadcast_time TIMESTAMP,
 broadcast_duration INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Event(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_schedules (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name STRING,
    start_time DATETIME,
    end_time DATETIME,
    venue_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venue_capacity(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE live_sports_broadcasts (
    broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    broadcast_name STRING,
    broadcast_date DATE,
    event_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES event_schedules(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    broadcast_id INT,
    ar_visualization BLOB,
    ar_audio BLOB,
    FOREIGN KEY (broadcast_id) REFERENCES live_sports_broadcasts(broadcast_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_schedules (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    venue_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE live_broadcasts (
    broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    broadcast_date DATE,
    broadcast_time TIME,
    broadcast_url VARCHAR(255)
);
